stickers.name: amiya_key
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya smacks a key on a keyboard with great force.

stickers.name: amiya_startle
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya is startled into jumping straight into the air. Her eyes are wide and her arms are blown back in shock. An exclamation mark visually shows her alarm as she leaves a shadow beneath her while mid-jump.

stickers.name: bunny_drive
stickers.alt: A bunny wearing a white visor sits in a car seat, holding onto the steering wheel with both... hands? Paws? They're a responsible bunny, wearing their seatbelt properly.

stickers.name: amiya_roll
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya rolls around on the floor. She has a slight frown, implying she's upset about something.

stickers.name: amiya_kaltsit_beg
stickers.alt: Bunny Kal'tsit stands, glancing behind her where Bunny Amiya is gripping the hem of her lab coat. Bunny Amiya is belly-down on the floor, presumably being dragged by Bunny Kal'tsit walking around.

stickers.name: kaltsit_punish
stickers.alt: Bunny Kal'tsit throws a syringe at the silhouette of a distant bunny.

stickers.name: chen_spin
stickers.alt: Bunny Ch'en sits in a bunny-sized wheelchair and spins around and around in the seat.

stickers.name: chen_huff
stickers.alt: Bunny Ch'en sits in a human-sized wheelchair is that much too big for her. She has her arms crossed as she huffs, upset.

stickers.name: courier_mail
stickers.alt: Bunny Courier holds up a letter envelope.

stickers.name: angelina_star
stickers.alt: Bunny Angelina grins as she waves a wand around, making a star spin around the top of the wand.

stickers.name: lappland_snooze
stickers.alt: Bunny Lappland stands with her eyes closed. She's snoozing, a snot bubble forming from her nose.

stickers.name: lappland_sword
stickers.alt: Bunny Lappland smiles as she drags around the sword of the full-size Lappland that is too big for her to pick up.

stickers.name: lappland_despair
stickers.alt: Bunny Lappland is smiling, but her widened eyes and shadow of despair over her eyes tell that she just received some bad news.

stickers.name: bunny_call
stickers.alt: A bunny with a white visor brings their phone to their left ear. Their speech bubble says 'Hey there?' in Chinese.
stickers.caption: [Greeting for someone far away]? (or) Hey there?

stickers.name: courier_soak
stickers.alt: Bunny Courier soaks in a hot spring.

stickers.name: amiya_crownslayer_tuck
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya pulls a blanket over a sleeping Bunny Crownslayer.

stickers.name: amiya_carrot
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya looks down at the carrot in her hands.

stickers.name: angelina_hurt
stickers.alt: Bunny Angelina sits with her eyes closed and a tear coming out of her left eye. There are adhesive bandages in a cross formation in the middle of her forehead.

stickers.name: bunny_box
stickers.alt: A bunny with a white visor pops out of a cardboard box with a wink and a smile.

stickers.name: chen_thisguy
stickers.alt: Bunny Ch'en points at a polaroid with a suspicous look. 'this guy' is written in the bottom margin. The polaroid is empty, allowing this sticker to be used as a meme template.

stickers.name: courier_cold
stickers.alt: Bunny Courier hugs himself in an effort to keep warm as snot drips out of his nose.

stickers.name: courier_interview
stickers.alt: Bunny Courier stands in front of a microphone for an interview. A black bar censors his eyes. He's smiling like he's just vibing and enjoying life.

stickers.name: crownslayer_claw
stickers.alt: Bunny Crownslayer is alarmed as she is held in the claw of a claw machine. She dangles over bunch of bunnies below.

stickers.name: crownslayer_sleep
stickers.alt: Bunny Crownslayer sleeps peacefully while holding onto a blanket covering her. She seems to be dreaming, but the bubble is cut off at the top of the frame, allowing this sticker to be used as a meme.

stickers.name: bunny_call_en
stickers.alt: A bunny with a white visor brings their phone to their left ear. Their speech bubble says 'Hi?'
stickers.caption: [Greeting for someone far away]? (or) Hey there?
